attributes.action: Not grant 450,000 asylum seekers indefinite leave to remain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On no account should indefinite leave to remain be given due to government incompetence and/or not demanding that asylum be claimed at the point of departure for the UK which is tantamount to giving illegals legal status. 1 in 4 asylum applications granted are known to result in terrorist or criminal activity.
